AC_Battery_Configuration.description: Get, set or cancel an AC Battery’s (ACB) sleep mode.
AC_Battery_Configuration.name: AC Battery (ACB) Configuration

Administer_Device_Conditions_and_Control.description: Send a Device Conditions and Controls (DCC) command, such as to clear a Ground Fault Interrupt (GFI).
Administer_Device_Conditions_and_Control.name: Administer Device Conditions and Controls (DCC)

Administer_Power_Meter_Unit.description: Add or read a Power Meter Unit (PMU).
Administer_Power_Meter_Unit.name: Administer Power Meter Unit (PMU)

Debug_Access.description: Get or set the Enphase® De-Bug Access (DBA) tunnel state.
Debug_Access.name: De-Bug Access (DBA)

description.long: A HTTP GET to `/production.json` can be used to get a JSON formatted object of the production data.

examples.name: Get Production Data (with each individual phase's details)

query.description: Specifies more detailed data should be provided. Currently this gives a further breakdown on each of the individual AC phases.
query.name: details

consumption.description: An object that contains the consumption details for the request.

production.description: An object that contains the production details for the request.

storage.description: An object that contains the storage details for the request.

activeCount.description: How many of these devices are active.

Device.apprntPwr: The apparent power value. The combination of reactive and true power measurement in Volt-Amperes (VA). Only available with the `eim` device type.

measurementType.description: What type of measurement this is reporting. Only available with the `eim` device type.

Device.pwrFactor: The power factor value. The ratio of the real power absorbed by the load to the apparent power flowing in the circuit. Only available with the `eim` device type.
Device.reactPwr: The reactive power value. The dissipated power resulting from inductive and capacitive loads measured in Volt-Amperes reactive (var). Only available with the `eim` device type.
Device.readingTime: The date and time in epoch format that the measurement was taken.
Device.rmsCurrent: The Root Mean Square current value. Only available with the `eim` device type.
Device.rmsVoltage: The Root Mean Square voltage value. Only available with the `eim` device type.

state.description: The state the AC Battery device is currently in. Only available with the `acb` device type.

type.description: Specifies what type of device this is a response from.

Device.vahLifetime: The total Volt-Ampere hour this device has seen. Only available with the `eim` device type.
Device.vahToday: The total number of Volt-Ampere hours (vah) seen today. Only available with the `eim` device type.
Device.varhLagLifetime: The total lagging Volt-Ampere reactive hours (varh) this device has seen. Only available with the `eim` device type.
Device.varhLagToday: The total lagging Volt-Ampere reactive hours (varh) seen today. Only available with the `eim` device type.
Device.varhLeadLifetime: The total leading Volt-Ampere reactive hours (varh) this device has seen. Only available with the `eim` device type.
Device.varhLeadToday: The total leading Volt-Ampere reactive hours (varh) seen today. Only available with the `eim` device type.
Device.whLastSevenDays: The total number of watt-hours seen in the last 7 days. Only available with the `eim` device type.
Device.whLifetime: The total number of watt-hours (Wh) this device has seen.
Device.whNow: Unknown. Only available with the `acb` device type.
Device.whToday: The total number of watt-hours seen today. Only available with the `eim` device type.
Device.wNow: The number of watts currently being reported.

ACBatteryState.description: The AC Battery is currently charging.
ACBatteryState.name: Charging

ACBatteryState.description: The AC Battery is currently supplying power.
ACBatteryState.name: Discharging

ACBatteryState.description: The AC Battery is currently full.
ACBatteryState.name: Full

ACBatteryState.description: The AC Battery (if present) is currently not full but is also not actively doing anything.
ACBatteryState.name: Idle

DeviceType.description: The built-in meter on the Gateway (formerly "Envoy").
DeviceType.name: Envoy Integrated Meter

DeviceType.description: An external ZigBee Revenue Grade Meter (RGM) such as the RGM-MTR-01. This is also known as the General Electric (GE) i210+ meter.
DeviceType.name: Revenue Grade Meter

MeasurementType.description: Reporting the energy produced from the inverters.
MeasurementType.name: Production

MeasurementType.description: Reporting the load with solar production included.
MeasurementType.name: Net Consumption

MeasurementType.description: Reporting the load only (solar production excluded).
MeasurementType.name: Total Consumption
